meanings.definition: The act of bringing or recalling a feeling, memory, or image to the mind.
meanings.sent1: The evocation of her childhood memories brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent2: His evocation of the beautiful sunset painted a vivid picture in my mind.
meanings.sent3: The evocation of his favorite cartoon character in the meeting made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her evocation of the past was like opening a treasure chest of forgotten moments.
meanings.sent5: The evocation of the smell of fresh bread made her nostalgic for home.

meanings.definition: The act of summoning or calling forth something, especially a spirit or demon.
meanings.sent1: The ancient ritual involved the evocation of powerful spirits from another realm.
meanings.sent2: The evocation of the ghostly figure sent shivers down their spines.
meanings.sent3: His evocation of a mischievous imp during the play added a comedic twist.
meanings.sent4: The evocation of courage in the face of danger was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The evocation of the ancient dragon in the story was both thrilling and terrifying.
